title: Basics of Herbalism
headline: This free online course teaches you everything you need to know to use herbs as organic medicines and beauty products.
description: If you're interested in all-natural herbal medicine, this course is an excellent place to start and provides the information and insider tips you need to perform herbal therapy. We explore the history of herbalism and trace its evolution from ancient herbal remedies to today’s advanced medical and cosmetic products. We provide the skills you need to use the healing power of plants to help yourself or your clients to look and feel your best.
courseDescription:
Learn how to use herbs and their roots to address a variety of common medical conditions like high blood pressure and low immunity. This professional herbalist training course teaches you everything you need to know about the healing qualities and uses of herbs and plant chemistry. We explore the history of traditional Chinese herbal treatments and explain how to harness the power of nature. We compare these methods to those employed in India and the Middle East.

We provide the skills required to work in a variety of professions ranging from medicine to the beauty industry. This course also trains you to work in wellness counselling, aromatherapy and holistic health teaching at home or as a qualified professional.

This course is designed for students with no prior knowledge of herbal medicine and has no prerequisites. Please note that you should seek medical help during emergencies as herbalism does not replace traditional medicine but complements it. People all over the world have long used herbs to improve their health, looks and mental wellbeing so sign up for this herbalism course to learn how to employ natural healthcare methods that have existed for millennia.
